items.sentence: This is our first Christmas here in Australia.
All three of Tom's brothers live in Australia.
Tom still lives in Australia with his parents.
My father won't let my sister go to Australia.
We should've stayed in Australia until Monday.
We went to Australia together three years ago.
We only have three days left to get this done.
Some of the villagers were unwilling to fight.
Let's not worry about what it's going to cost.
Let's not waste what little time we have left.
Let's not worry about hypothetical situations.
Tom gave three reasons why he did it that way.
Have they told you how late the train will be?
This work is so simple even a child can do it.
I sometimes wonder if I really should be here.
The poor child was on the verge of starvation.
Tom will get mugged again if he's not careful.
Why didn't you tell me that you would do that?
Why didn't you tell us that we should do that?
Why didn't you tell us that we had to do that?
